Real Name: Elijah Bradley
Team Up
1
TEAM UP: YOUNG AVENGERS: If Patriot is part of the listed themed team, he has: "If three or more friendly characters with the Young Avengers keyword are on the map, the first time each friendly character would be KO'd, instead turn them to their last non-KO click, then roll a d6 and heal them equal to half the result. Protected: Pulse Wave."

YOUNG AVENGERS, ASSEMBLE: Defend, Leadership.
